title: Real-time Customer Analytics Pipeline
description: Built a comprehensive real-time analytics pipeline processing 1M+ events per day using Apache Kafka, Spark Streaming, and Google BigQuery. Implemented automated data quality checks and monitoring dashboards that reduced data processing latency by 60%.

title: MLOps Platform for Credit Risk Assessment
description: Designed and implemented an end-to-end MLOps platform for credit risk assessment models. Features automated model training, validation, deployment, and monitoring with A/B testing capabilities. Improved model deployment time from weeks to hours.

title: Data Lake Migration to Cloud
description: Led the migration of a 500TB on-premises data lake to Google Cloud Platform. Implemented data governance, security, and cost optimization strategies. Achieved 40% cost reduction while improving query performance by 3x.

title: Open Source ETL Framework
description: Created and maintain an open-source ETL framework that simplifies data pipeline development. Features include automatic schema evolution, data lineage tracking, and built-in monitoring. Used by 50+ companies worldwide.
